item.title: Upgrading on Linux
item.description: By installing the new ArangoDB package the standalone instance is automatically upgraded. In addition to the ArangoDB daemon (arangod), also the ArangoDB Starter binary is updated. As a result, the procedure described below is a first step to upgrade more complex deployments such as a Cluster setup.
